Package io.github.hhromic.uimr.stats

UIMR Java Toolbox - Statistics package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Statistics<T extends Number>
    This interface defines Statistics for Numbers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountingMatrix<K1,K2>
    Generic Counting Matrix class.
    Distribution<E>
    This class handles a data distribution table.
    DoubleStatistics
    This class implements Statistics for Double data values.
    LongStatistics
    This class implements Statistics for Long data values.
    TopNTable<K extends Comparable<K>,V extends Comparable<V>>
    This class handles a top-n data table.
    TopNTable.Entry<K extends Comparable<K>,V extends Comparable<V>>
    Table Entry class.

Package io.github.hhromic.uimr.stats Description

UIMR Java Toolbox - Statistics package.

This package contains useful general purpose Java utility classes for computing streaming (and non-streaming too) Statistics.

Since:
4.0
Author:
Hugo Hromic
See Also:
io.github.hhromic.uimr
